| History                 = Divine Right was one of the most powerful aryan supremacist prison gangs in the United States. They trafficked in heroin and methamphetamine outside and inside the prison. [[Daniel Rand (Earth-616)|Iron Fist]] went to their New York base to hear about [[Eugene Mason (Earth-616)|Crime-Buster]]'s death, but instead found out that the Divine Right had been framed for the death of [[Muhammad Zebari (Earth-616)|Muhammad Zebari]], the founder of [[Penance Corps (Earth-616)|Penance Corporation]].{{r|Power Man and Iron Fist Vol 2 4}}
